channel.title: Empire total war
channel.description:
Well I've read some reviews and things and am thinking about getting this with my new card as you've seen in my other threads.
I've also watched some videos and, since I'm a fan of the total war series I'm really thinking about this game. [Anyways I'm pretty sure a 9800gt can handle this on max. If not just tell me]
But the problem is it has a bad rating..3.2/5
Can you share some experiences with it or if it's worth to get?
Thanks

item.title: Empire total war
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I use torrents because I am away from my computer for long periods of time and it just works out that way. I do use rapidshare every now and then but most things are multipart and I can’t sit around clicking links every 20 minutes or something.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Offtopic: torrents are oldschool, Rapidshare is future, takes me 3 hours for empire total war

Ontopic: game is good but hard to get into and if you choose brits you can never lose

item.title: Empire total war
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Definitely not the best of the series but it’s good to kill a few hours.

Elijah:

You are actually going to buy it? l2torrent

I bought it, it’s several GB and these types of torrents take weeks to download.

Read full topic

item.title: Empire total war
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

I’ve played Medieval: Total war. It’s fun for a while, but gets boring because it’s the same all the time. I like a game where you have to manage everything, like the ‘Anno’ series. But if you like to command big battles, this is a great game for you.

I’m pretty sure for every campaign it’s different in medieval 2. The only downside in Rtw is that the only campaigns which are different are the roman campaigns 'cause of senate missions. The rest are practically the same; alliance, trade, conquer.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:2, topic:296261”]ive tried medieval total war 2, it got boring really fast. maybe its just cause i dont like turn based games

all of the total war games are the same anyway[/quote]
Yeah I did play it at my friends house. But rome total war can be really fun if you like playing campaign and multiplayer

I’m mainly looking at empire total war because of the 18th century warfare and because it is turn based(love turn based game)
